text: Thatayaone Ditlhokwe (born 21 September 1998) is a Motswana footballer playing as a defender for Supersport United. He is also a full Botswana international, having made eight appearances and scored two goals since his debut on June 1 2018. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Botswana's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
